channel.title: Can we get people banned just for being complete retards?
channel.description: I was on server today and my game got completely ruined by these guys. Must admit the convo on this image is meh but the rest of it made me :eek: Was wondering if there was anything we could do to stop this crap? Also if there's any rules about language and slang on the server. [img]http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/28/20110708140400.png/[/img]

item.title: Can we get people banned just for being complete retards?
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

We’re not allowed to IP ban. Only Davidi2 and MITB can.

Read full topic
item.source: Can we get people banned just for being complete retards?

item.title: Can we get people banned just for being complete retards?
item.dc:creator: @Seductress Seductress
item.description:
@Seductress wrote:

Tom_BETA:

These people are all ban evaders, there isn’t any new idiots coming to the server it’s just the same people ban evading badly.

Is it possible to ban their IP addresses? Also muting is a good idea I reckon.

Read full topic
item.source: Can we get people banned just for being complete retards?

item.title: Can we get people banned just for being complete retards?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

mironic:

the only language rule is “English or gtfo” also your image dont work.

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:5, topic:402964”]These people are all ban evaders, there isn’t any new idiots coming to the server it’s just the same people ban evading badly.[/quote]Let me guess, nick and jared? They wont stfu about how everyone is gay and has no life, when they’re the ones spending their entire day trying to ban evade.

Read full topic
